syllabus:
\[This course will be taught in English.\]

This course outline is based on NTNU "16+2 Weeks":   
"16 Weeks" are scheduled as follows. "+2 Weeks" will be explained in class. Thank you.

Tentative Schedule (暫定大綱)

Week 1：Course Introduction, and Globalization (C1)

Week 2：National Differences in Political, Economic, and Legal Systems (C2)

Week 3：National Differences in Economic Development (C3)

Week 4：Differences in Culture (C4)

Week 5：International Trade Theory (C6)

Week 6：Government Policy and International Trade (C7)

Week 7：Foreign Direct Investment (C8)

Week 8：Course Review/Supplement: The Strategy of International Business (C12) & Mid-Term Exam

Week 9：Multimedia/Learning Activities/Supplement: Ethics, Corporate Social Responsibility, and Sustainability (C5)

Week 10：The Foreign Exchange Market (C10)

Week 11：Exporting, Importing, and Countertrade (C14)

Week 12：Global Production and Supply Chain Management (C15)

Week 13：Global Marketing and Business Analytics (C16)

Week 14：Global Human Resource Management (C17)

Week 15：Presentations

Week 16：Course Wrap-Up & Final Exam

Note: "+2 Weeks" will be explained in class. The info above is subject to change without notice or with notice in class and/or via emails. Thank you.

methodologies.note: 講述跨國企業經營策略重要概念、理論與實務。 Class lecturing on important concepts, theories and practices.
討論重要議題，分全班討論與小組討論。Class/group discussions on important subjects.
透過個案案例問題解決教學。Problem solving through case/example studies.
透過小組合作學習。Collaborative learning through groups.
配合相關議題之多媒體應用。Supplemented with multimedia.

grading.note: 個案/案例討論上臺報告/ Case presentation
